StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateOCSClassDates]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Class varchar(8), @FY int, @ClassIncrement int, @StartDate date.me, @EndDate date.me, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OCS_CLASS WHERE TRAINING_TYPE_CODE = @Class AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FY AND CLASS_NUMBER = @ClassIncrement) BEGIN UPDATE OCS_CLASS SET CLASS_BEGIN_DATE = @StartDate, CLASS_END_DATE = @EndDate, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE TRAINING_TYPE_CODE = @Class AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FY AND CLASS_NUMBER = @ClassIncrement END
